title: League Disconnection Issues
body:
Hi, I've recently been having a semi bad internet connection and when i leave game to reconnect, my league hasn't been reconnecting so in return I'm getting banned because I am having to spend time on restarting my computer so that my league will work again and Im not finding it very fair and now my friends don't want to play with me much anymore because of it, is anyone else having this issue? if so can you please share about what you did to fix the internet connect? I can't change internet services either, all help would be appreciated. {{item:3070}}

-Yup! That Tastes Purple-

replies.body:
Hey Shilica,

Do you know what the cause of the internet issues is?  

There are a few things you can do within your home network that might help out (see [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) on the support page). 

I'd also suggest you call your ISP and find out if there are any settings you can tweak that might help to make things more stable.

Let me know if you've got any questions.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hello, I am unsure of what the internet issue is and is there any way of being able to drop the 5 delayed games..? as it is not actually my fault, if there isn't any way I understand and I will just have to sit through the wait before i play a few games

Hi,

We don't remove the low prioritiy queue from players in cases like this, as this kind of situation  is exactly what it exists for.

While it sucks to get put in the low priority queue like this, remember that each game you disconnect from also affects the other players in that game unfairly, making for a poor experience that is not their fault at all.

While random disconnects may seem like they are not your fault, ultimately it is your responsibility to ensure you have a stable internet connection when you play League.  Low priority queue is your warning sign that you should really prioritize fixing these stability issues as they are causing problems for other people too.

As I mentioned in the initial reply, there are lots of steps you can take to try and resolve this and I'd strongly encourage you to try some of them.  If you ignore the problem, it is likely you will find yourself in low priority queues again in the future.

I hope this helps you understand why this system exists, but please do feel free to ask any more questions if you have them.

Cheers
Mindstar

There is another problem as i stated in my discussion topic, when i leave the game and try to reconnect once my internet is completely fine it won't let me reconnect at all, even though my internet connection is fine, how do I fix that? because this has only been happening since the recent patch.

If I'm reading this right, you have cases where your internet briefly disconnects and reconnects? (correct me if I'm wrong).

In cases like this, where the "attempting to reconnect" window is not progressing (even though your internet is working again), I'd recommend you exit League completely and log in again, to make sure everything re-initialises correctly with your internet stable.

Ok thank you for your help, I will try that next time it happens.
